Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Changed: The plugin now uses Dalamud's language setting and will fall back to English if there's no translation available. If you haven't changed the language in HaselTweaks itself, nothing will change for you.
- Fixed: Item names, chocobo colors or portrait expressions, are now respecting the language selected in Dalamud instead of using the client's language.

Gear Set Grid

- Fixed: When opened in game and returned to the main menu, the window was still visible. It is now automatically hidden when you're not logged in.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Changelog:
- Changed: The plugin now uses Dalamud's language setting and will fall back to English if there's no translation available. If you haven't changed the language in LeveHelper itself, nothing will change for you.
- Fixed: Issuer for Blood in the Water at level 68 was incorrect.  
  If someone could update it on the Gamer Escape's wiki, that would be awesome. I can't because my ISPs IP address is listed on DNSBL. ‍️

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog:
- Added: A context menu for the required quest icon was added with an option to open the quest on Garland Tools DB. (Screenshot)
- Changed: The tomestone icon and quantity in the "Tomestones Required" column will be darkened if you have fewer tombstones than needed for that item. (Screenshot)
- Fixed: In the Triple Triad Cards tooltip, the fourth and fifth stars were on opposite sides. (Screenshot)
